goal: Add TypeScript artifact type support to manifest validator
description: Enable manifest validator to recognize and validate TypeScript-specific artifact types (interface, type, enum, namespace) by treating them as semantically equivalent to class declarations for validation purposes. This resolves validation failures when using TypeScript snapshots that generate these artifact types.

contains.name: _ARTIFACT_TYPE_INTERFACE
contains.description: Constant for TypeScript interface artifact type

contains.name: _ARTIFACT_TYPE_TYPE
contains.description: Constant for TypeScript type alias artifact type

contains.name: _ARTIFACT_TYPE_ENUM
contains.description: Constant for TypeScript enum artifact type

contains.name: _ARTIFACT_TYPE_NAMESPACE
contains.description: Constant for TypeScript namespace artifact type

contains.name: _validate_single_artifact
contains.description: Validate a single artifact including TypeScript types
